wikipedia_page.main: Henry "Harry" Haddock (26 July 1925 – 18 December 1998) was a Scottish footballer who played as a left back and spent almost his entire career with Clyde. He was also selected in the Scotland squad for the 1958 FIFA World Cup.

response: The venue also hosted the annual Glasgow vs Sheffield Inter-City match in 1901, 1954, and 1956. Both Harry Haddock and Tommy Ring played in the two latter matches, with Ring scoring in both.
